sentences.en: a congress of the ruling Labor Party
sentences.cn: 执政党工党的代表大会

sentences.en: Congress has legislated a new minimum wage for workers.
sentences.cn: 国会制定了一项新的关于工人最低工资的法律.

sentences.en: Congress has to bend to his will.
sentences.cn: 国会不得不屈从于他的意志。
国会因意见分歧而陷入僵局。

sentences.en: Congress is waiting to see how the Oval Office will react.
sentences.cn: 国会正观望总统方面的反应。

sentences.en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

sentences.en: From September until December, Congress remained in session.
sentences.cn: 从9月到12月，国会一直都在开会。

sentences.en: Only an act of Congress could rectify the situation.
sentences.cn: 只有国会法案才能矫正这种形势。

sentences.en: The committee held its founding congress in the capital, Riga.
sentences.cn: 委员会在首都里加召开了成立大会。

sentences.en: The Congress had agreed to reconsider its stance on the armed struggle.
sentences.cn: 国会已同意重新考虑其对武装斗争的态度。

sentences.en: The Congress voted down a motion to change the union's structure.
sentences.cn: 国会投票否决了改变工会结构的动议。

sentences.en: The meeting was organised by Congress-woman Maxine Waters.
sentences.cn: 会议由众议员玛克辛·沃特斯组织。

sentences.en: The President has lost the support of Congress.
The President was given a blank check by Congress to continue the war.
sentences.cn: 国会授予总统全权可继续这场战争。

sentences.en: There are 73 unions affiliated to the Trades Union Congress.
sentences.cn: 共有73家工会隶属于英国职工大会。

sentences.en: There was something of this mood running throughout the Congress's deliberations.
sentences.cn: 国会的商讨过程中一直透露出几分这样的情绪。

sentences.en: Will this be enough to persuade Congress to cough up?

words.tran_cn: （美）国会女议员；众议院女议员

phrases.tran_cn: 国会议员；美国众议院议员

trans.tran_en: a formal meeting of representatives of different groups, countries etc, to discuss ideas, make decisions etc
